content.rendered:
North Cyprus

🏙️🏙 LUXURY FIVE-STAR HOUSE — BEACHFRONT HOTEL

📣 GENERAL INFORMATION

LOS ANGELES is a new large-scale resort complex, located on the beachfront in Morphou Bay in the Gaziveren area of North Cyprus. Indeed, has an ideal location, in a sparsely populated, ecologically impeccable place, which is one of the reasons why many people wishing to buy property in Cyprus, decided to buy it here. The complex is located right by the beautiful sandy beach, a short walk from the center of Gaziveren. Gaziveren is a picturesque town in the northern part of the island, where you can find many stores, cafes and restaurants. You can also buy everything you need for your daily needs in the nearby town of Lefke.

North Cyprus

🏙️🏙 LUXURY FIVE-STAR HOUSE — BEACHFRONT HOTEL

📣 GENERAL INFORMATION

LOS ANGELES is a new large-scale resort complex, located on the beachfront in Morphou Bay in the Gaziveren area of North Cyprus. Indeed, has an ideal location, in a sparsely populated, ecologically impeccable place, which is one of the reasons why many people wishing to buy property in Cyprus, decided to buy it here. The complex is located right by the beautiful sandy beach, a short walk from the center of Gaziveren. Gaziveren is a picturesque town in the northern part of the island, where you can find many stores, cafes and restaurants. You can also buy everything you need for your daily needs in the nearby town of Lefke.

Unique solutions:

Apartments, with access to the pool from the first floor terraces.

Shuttle to the beach directly from the complex.

Cascading terraces

Aquapark

Infrastructure and amenities:
● Outdoor pools with recreation areas
Indoor heated pool
Fitness center: exercise machines, Pilates.
● Sauna
● Beachside restaurant and bar
Children’s playground
● Outdoor parking lots
● Equipped beach strip
● Entertainment on the beach
Kitesurfing
Windsurfing
Cab service
Concierge service
● Management company

⭐ Best prices and construction terms

More than 35 infrastructural elements in total, including

Near Girne and Nicosia, a new up-and-coming neighborhood with approved government programs for road construction, waterfront. Israeli medical center with a full range of services from routine specialist examinations to invasive interventions, cardiology, pediatrics, chemotherapy and plastic surgery clinic with the latest in laser technology and telemedicine.

🔸 SPA

🔸 САУНА И ХАММАМ ОТДЕЛЬНО ДЛЯ МУЖЧИН И ЖЕНЩИН

🔸 ТРЕНАЖЕРНЫЙ ЗАЛ

🔸 ОТКРЫТЫЙ БАССЕЙН

🔸 ДЕТСКИЙ БАССЕЙН

🔸 ДЕТСКИЙ САД

🔸 ДЕТСКИЕ СПОРТИВНЫЕ ПЛОЩАДКИ

🔸 ЗАКРЫТАЯ ПАРКОВКА ПОД КАЖДОЙ КВАРТИРОЙ

🔸 ТЕРРАСЫ С ДОСТУПОМ К ЧАСТНОМУ БАССЕЙНУ С БАЛКОНА

🔸 БАР «LAUNGE

🔸 РЕСТОРАН

🔸 ЗОНА БАРБЕКЮ

🔸 ЗАРЯДНЫЕ УСТРОЙСТВА ДЛЯ ЭЛЕКТРОМОБИЛЕЙ

🔸 ЧАСТНЫЙ ПЛЯЖ

Апартаменты: 1+0, 1+1, 2+1

План оплаты :

☝️Бронь-2000 GBP

☝️Первоначальный первоначальный взнос -35%

☝️Далее рассрочка до конца строительства

За дополнительной информацией обращайтесь к Oasis Home.SMART (С. Кипр) Telegram-чат: https://t.me/+eb2kpEWgnbg2ZDEy
